text: Waldemaro Bartolozzi (26 October 1927 â€“ 16 December 2020) was an Italian racing cyclist. He finished in ninth place in the 1956 Giro d'Italia. He was born in Scandicci, Italy. Bartolozzi died on 16 December 2020 in Scandicci at the age of 93.Ex-NSW deputy premier Ian Armstrong dies ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian cyclists
title: Waldemaro Bartolozzi
